result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Garett Benz

records.addlTxt: Per Brown County Jail, zoom is not available for 12/12/22 hearing at 9:45 am.  Per Judge Ehlers, set up phone appearance.   Phone appearance set up with Brown County Jail for 12/12/22 hearing.
for Brown County Jail
Status conference on December 12, 2022 at 09:45 am.

2:38 PM Defendant Garett Benz not in court.  Attorney Brian David Van Ells in court for Garett Benz.  Attorney Colleen Catherine Nordin in court for State of Wisconsin. Court reviews events in file, questions where defendant is.  Atty Van Ells indicates defendant is in Brown County Jail.  Court reschedules.  Bond remains in effect.
Status conference scheduled for December 12, 2022 at 09:45 am.
Status conference on October 24, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Defense waives reading of Information and enters not guilty plea. Bond remains in effect.

2:09 PM   Defendant Garett Benz in court.  Attorney Brian David Van Ells in court for Garett Benz.  Prosecuting attorney Colleen Catherine Nordin in court for the State of Wisconsin.   Defense waives right to Prelim. Court questions defendant on waiver. Court finds waiver made freely and voluntarily, accepts waiver and binds over for trial. Court finds probable cause for bindover.
Status conference scheduled for October 24, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Preliminary hearing on August 29, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Subpoena Witness Data Sheet

1:15 PM Defendant Garett Benz in court.  Attorney Brian David Van Ells in court for Garett Benz.  Attorney Colleen Catherine Nordin in court for State of Wisconsin. Defense waives formal reading of criminal complaint, requests prelim but will waive time-limits for prelim, JA Parks will schedule prelim. Bond remains in effect.
Status conference on July 6, 2022 at 01:15 pm.

10:58 AM   Prosecuting attorney Nicholas Paul Grode in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Garett Benz not in court.  Attorney Brian David Van Ells in court for Garett Benz.   Court reviews events in file, questions Atty Van Ells on defendant's whereabouts.  Court indicates defendant did call the court this morning saying he was going to be 25 minutes late and has yet to appear. . State advises defendant was in jail in Brown County and has been released. Atty Van Ells hasn't had any contact with defendant lately, not finding that he's in any jail. in Wisconsin.  Court orders bench warrant but stays signing warrant until 4:30 pm on 7/05/22 to give Atty Van Ells time to try and locate defendant and make other arrangements for him to appear.  If warrant is issued, it will be statewide.
Adjourned initial appearance on July 1, 2022 at 09:30 am.

Per Kylie at SPD:  When he contacted our office in April it was for his Brown County case and the person doing the eval did not know he had a Door County case. But his attorney contacted our office this morning and said he will take that case as well. I'll be working on getting that taken care of this afternoon.

11:04 AM Prosecuting attorney Nicholas Paul Grode in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Garett Benz in court.   Court reviews events in file, questions defendant on where he's at in retaining counsel or contacting SPD to see if he qualifies.  Defendant indicates he contacted SPD after last hearing and was assured that an attorney would appear in court with him today.  Court advises nothing has been filed from SPD, advises defendant to contact their office again to see where things are at in getting counsel appointed.  Bond remains in effect.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for July 1, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Adjourned initial appearance on June 13, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Defendant appeared on his own at 11:45 am.

11:30 AM   Prosecuting attorney Nicholas Paul Grode in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Garett Benz not in court.   Court reviews events in file.  State has not heard anything from defendant, requests bench warrant.  Court orders bench warrant (statewide).  Court recalls case at 12:00 pm as defendant has now appeared.  Court cancels warrant, questions defendant on where he's at regarding legal counsel Defendant indicates he has a public defender for his Brown County case, thought that attorney was going to appear with him today.  Court indicates nothing has been filed from SPD appointing an attorney in this matter, encourages defendant to contact SPD office again and advise them of his Door County charges so counsel can be appointed.  State not requesting any change to defendants bond.  Court reschedules matter.  Bond remains in effect as previously set.  Adjourned Initial Appearance scheduled for June 13, 2022 at 9 AM.
Defendant was fingerprinted 4/18/22.
Adjourned initial appearance on May 24, 2022 at 11:30 am.
Not to possess or consume any controlled substances without a valid prescription and then take only in the amount and frequency prescribed. Not to possess or use any drug paraphernalia.

9:42 AM Defendant Garett Benz not in court.  Attorney Colleen Catherine Nordin in court for State of Wisconsin.   Court reviews citations issued to defendant showing mandatory appearance this morning.  State was evaluated for diversion program and he never followed through so was told to be in court today.  Clerk LS advised that in message from JA Park, defendant just called and will be here in 10 minutes.  Court will recall case when defendant arrives.  Court recalls case at 10:51 am.  Defendant appears by phone.  Defendant indicates he ran out of gas, isn't going to be able make it.  Defendant trying to get ahold of someone to help him.  Court advises defendant to head to the Justice Center once he has gas.  If defendant doesn't appear by 4:30 today, Court will be issuing a warrant.  Defendant appears at 2:52 pm.  Atty Shannon Viel appears with defendant, indicates defendant will need to contact their office Tuesday to see if he qualifies for their representation.  Court reviews charge(s), max. penalties, right to counsel, right to prelim..  Court schedules AIA to give defendant time to talk to SPD before proceeding.  Court questions defendant on address/employment.  Bond set.  Court will send petition for court appointed counsel form with defendant if defendant doesn't qualify for SPD and wishes to go that route.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for May 24, 2022 at 11:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Garett Benz
Current: 1412 Lincoln  Street, Apt. 4, Kewaunee, WI 54216 United States  (Effective: 04-11-2022)
Prior: E6248 Washington Road, Algoma, WI 54201
